EmailTemplate.subject: Take advantage of the NJPA Fleet Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for allowing me to introduce myself as the WEX Regional Sales Manager in your area. All government, education, and nonprofit agencies are eligible.
State, local government, educational and nonprofit agencies have unique needs. With the NJPA WEX Fleet Card, you get the tools you need to manage your fleet – control over fleet purchases, comprehensive reporting, and world class Customer Service. Additional specialized services are available for the public sector such as Tax Exemption & Reporting, and Dedicated Support Services.
Benefits:
Acceptance – at over 90% of US Retail Fuel locations Addresses RFP Requirements - As with all NJPA products, the NJPA WEX Fleet Card will satisfy most bidding requirements. It was chosen through a competitive bidding process. Valuable Rebates – off all monthly retail transactions charged to your account Special Pricing – setup fees and monthly card fees waived for NJPA members Real-Time Online Account Access – to control, manage and track fleet purchases Tax Exemption and Reporting – for qualified fleets to significantly reduce accounting and administrative time 24/7 Customer Service – a knowledgeable representative is always available to help you and your drivers Roadside Assistance – keep drivers covered while they are on the road Fuel Site Mapping Mobile Application – locate the lowest price fuel stations
To learn more about how you can participate and start saving today, give me a call today.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone}
